metadata.title: CVE-2016-7504 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was observed in Rp_toString function ofArtifex Software, Inc. MuJS before5c337af4b3df80cf967e4f9f6a21522de84b392a. A successful exploitation of thisissue can lead to code execution or denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
